thread.section_title: Brake Performance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brake Performance | brakeperformance.com | 4 of 64
thread.title: Brian C.
thread.title_full: Brake Performance reviewed by Brian C.

author: Brian C.
title: Brian C.
text:
I had never ordered from or even heard of Brake Performance until a co-worker suggested that I take a look at them as an alternative to Amazon pricing and other discount online brake parts places. The prices were way better and the shipping was right on track.
I have a rare vehicle and ordering brake parts is especially problematic. I also get the wrong parts when ordering from other places and have to return and talk to someone to make sure they get it right. Not so here. They shipped the right thing the first time.
The parts *seem* to be quality made but time will tell how well they hold up!
I plan on ordering from them again!
